name: Lighthouse Keeper
description:
Get yourself comfortable!
You are tasked with taking care of an old Lighthouse and this small island is now your new home.
Hunt for fish or seagulls for food or grow your own vegetables by repairing the farm.
Chop down trees, mine for minerals and upgrade your tools.
Time wears down the old Lighthouse, figure out how it's mechanisms work to make sure they work again.
Sometimes you'll need materials, sometimes you'll just need to be smart.
Sail to different islands with your boat and discover their secrets and collect additional resources.
